did.abstract: The Curricula Materials- School of Social Work Collection houses official documents and other papers from the School of Social Work. Contains departmental meeting minutes and other records. For the full collection details see the finding aid.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Caitlin Johns September 2010. Finding aid by Caitlin Johns and Gene Hyde October 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Curricula Materials- School of Social Work Collection houses official documents and other papers from the School of Social Work. This collection houses departmental meeting minutes from 1986- 2003. As well as graduate meeting minutes from 1995- 2004 and undergraduate meeting minutes from 1995- 2005. In addition there are assorted meeting minutes of the BSW Admissions Committee from 1996-2000 and MSW Admissions Committee meeting minutes from 2002 and 2003.

blockquote.p: Box 1 - School of Social Work Committee Minutes

Box 3- School of Social Work Committee Minutes
Box 4: School of Social Work Assorted Meeting Minutes
